item.title: Analysis of PTT Online Community: Popular Lipstick Colors for Fall and Winter and Customer Segmentation
item.description: No prior knowledge about cosmetics? No worries, you can still choose the perfect lipstick as a Christmas gift for your girlfriend or friends by observing the language used by PTT users.

item.title: Kaggle-House Price Prediction Practice
item.description: How much should a house be sold for to meet the market?
